org.cef.network

Class CefWebPluginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cef.network.CefWebPluginManager

  • public abstract class CefWebPluginManager
extends Object
    Class used to manage web plugins.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void addPlugin(String path)
      Add a plugin path (directory + file).
      abstract void addPluginDirectory(String directory)
      Add a plugin directory.
      abstract void forcePluginShutdown(String path)
      Force a plugin to shutdown.
      static CefWebPluginManager getGlobalManager()
      Returns the global plugin manager.
      abstract void isWebPluginUnstable(String path, CefWebPluginUnstableCallback callback)
      Query if a plugin is unstable.
      abstract void refreshPlugins()
      Cause the plugin list to refresh the next time it is accessed regardless of whether it has already been loaded.
      abstract void registerPluginCrash(String path)
      Register a plugin crash.
      abstract void removePlugin(String path)
      Remove a plugin path (directory + file).
      abstract void unregisterInternalPlugin(String path)
      Unregister an internal plugin.
      abstract void visitPlugins(CefWebPluginInfoVisitor visitor)
      Visit web plugin information.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addPlugin

        public abstract void addPlugin(String path)
        Add a plugin path (directory + file). This change may not take affect until after refreshPlugins() is called. Can be called on any thread in the browser process.

      • addPluginDirectory

        public abstract void addPluginDirectory(String directory)
        Add a plugin directory. This change may not take affect until after refreshPlugins() is called. Can be called on any thread in the browser process.

      • forcePluginShutdown

        public abstract void forcePluginShutdown(String path)
        Force a plugin to shutdown. Can be called on any thread in the browser process but will be executed on the IO thread.

      • getGlobalManager

        public static final CefWebPluginManager getGlobalManager()
        Returns the global plugin manager.

      • isWebPluginUnstable

        public abstract void isWebPluginUnstable(String path,
                                         CefWebPluginUnstableCallback callback)
        Query if a plugin is unstable. Can be called on any thread in the browser process.

      • refreshPlugins

        public abstract void refreshPlugins()
        Cause the plugin list to refresh the next time it is accessed regardless of whether it has already been loaded. Can be called on any thread in the browser process.

      • registerPluginCrash

        public abstract void registerPluginCrash(String path)
        Register a plugin crash. Can be called on any thread in the browser process but will be executed on the IO thread.

      • removePlugin

        public abstract void removePlugin(String path)
        Remove a plugin path (directory + file). This change may not take affect until after CefRefreshWebPlugins() is called. Can be called on any thread in the browser process.

      • unregisterInternalPlugin

        public abstract void unregisterInternalPlugin(String path)
        Unregister an internal plugin. This may be undone the next time CefRefreshWebPlugins() is called. Can be called on any thread in the browser process.

      • visitPlugins

        public abstract void visitPlugins(CefWebPluginInfoVisitor visitor)
        Visit web plugin information. Can be called on any thread in the browser process.
        Parameters:
        visitor - Called with plugin information when available.
